definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: She is a pre-business major and wants to study accounting or actuarial science. She heard UW-Madison’s business school had a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 她将要进入商学院，想要攻读会计或是精算。

sentences.english: Nowadays, risk theory is a hot topic both in actuarial science and mathematics research.
sentences.chinese: 风险理论是当今精算界和数学界研究的热门课题。

sentences.english: Borrowing from his work in actuarial science and insurance and his knowledge of the broken-heart syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 借助于他在精算学和保险学以及对心碎症状的知识。

sentences.english: Actuarial gains and losses are recognised over the average remaining service lives of employees.
sentences.chinese: 精算收益及亏损于雇员的平均馀下服务年期内确认。

sentences.english: Actuaries are an important part of the management team of the companies that employ them.
sentences.chinese: 精算师是公司管理层的重要一部分。

sentences.english: Vicky Yang, 30, is an actuary at an accounting firm in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 30岁，在北京的一家财会公司做精算师。

sentences.english: Mr. Wu is a Member of the American Academy of Actuaries.
sentences.chinese: 伍先生是美国精算师学会会员。

sentences.english: In the present actuarial science and mathematics research, risk theory is a hot topic.
sentences.chinese: 风险理论是当前精算界和数学界研究的热门课题。

sentences.english: No previous course work in Actuarial Science is required.
sentences.chinese: 没有精算学前课程的工作是必需的。

sentences.english: Risk theory is popular topic in the present actuarial science and mathematics science.
sentences.chinese: 风险理论是当前精算和数学界研究的热门课题。

sentences.english: Becoming an Actuary requires passing a rigorous serried of exams.
sentences.chinese: 要成为精算师需要通过各种严格的系列考试。

definition: reinsurance (contractual device spreading risk between insurers)
